button.pay.description: Button text used for paying the order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text used for continuing the order payment.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text used for checking the order details.

button.query.description: Button text used for querying the order.

button.finish.description: Button text used for manually completing the order.

button.update.description: Button text used for updating the order.

field.amount.description: The points amount of the order.

field.price.description: The points amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method of the order.

field.api.description: API is a type of online service.

field.proxy.description: A proxy is an online service used for data transmission in HTTP proxy.

message.orderExpired.message: Zamówienie wygasło. Proszę utwórz nowe zamówienie do opłacenia.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Proszę otworzyć WeChat na telefonie i zeskanować kod, aby zakończyć płatność

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Proszę zrealizować płatność w zewnętrznym linku
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message for payment in external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: To działanie spowoduje ręczne ustawienie zamówienia jako opłacone i zakończenie procesu dystrybucji, nie można go cofnąć. Proszę potwierdzić, że klient zakończył płatność. Czy chcesz kontynuować?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating the order is still pending for user's payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating the order has been paid.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating the order has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating the payment has failed.

title.info.description: The title used as website title, indicating order information.

title.wechatPay.description: The title used as website title, indicating WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: The title used as website title, indicating AliPay payment, AliPay is a type of online payment.

title.stripe.description: The title used as website title, indicating Stripe payment, Stripe is a type of online payment.

title.manageOrder.description: The title used as website title, indicating to manage the order.
